member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Tools.Maml.MainCore(Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.TlcEnvironment,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The main method to invoke TLC, with some high level configuration options set.
member.param: The environment used in this run of TLC, for the purpose of returning outputs.

"Marked" exceptions are assumed to be sufficiently descriptive, so we do not print stack traces for them to the console, and instead print these only to a log file. However, throwing unmarked exceptions is considered a bug in TLC (even if due to bad user input), so we always write . If set to true though, this executable will also print stack traces from the marked exceptions as well.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Tools.Maml.PrintFullExceptionDetails(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Exception)
member.summary: Prints exception type, message, stack trace and data for every exception in the chain.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Tools.Maml.PrintFullExceptionDetails(Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IChannel,System.Exception)
member.summary: Prints exception type, message, stack trace and data for every exception in the chain.
